price: 50. Ils dirent : « Il n’y a là aucun mal, puisque c’est vers notre Seigneur que nous ferons retour.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā ḍayra innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūna
